backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing shipments with add, update, and query functions, storing events and details in a map.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a scroll-to-top routing feature with associated frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files, detailing layout, components, hooks, pages, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document mounting the app root and loading the Vite entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that configures TanStack Router routes wrapped in ThemeProvider and SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetailsCa: Component displaying email, phone numbers, office and registered addresses, and business hours in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop and mobile menus, active route highlighting, and Get Quote CTA.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Standalone offline/maintenance screen showing an unavailable message with no navigation or backend calls.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Component subscribing to router events to reset the window scroll position to the top on navigation.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryS: Component rendering a titled service category with icon and a grid of service cards separated by a divider.
frontend/src/components/ServicePreviewGr: Grid showing four key service previews with icons and descriptions using card components.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, links, services, and contact details using icons and styled sections.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, and scroll handler around page content.
frontend/src/components/StatsStrip.tsx: Displays a four-item statistics strip with icons and values in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/entry.tsx: Defines the app entrypoint with a maintenance-mode gate that conditionally loads the full app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module placeholder noting no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useShipmentTracking.t: Fetches shipment details via the backend actor based on a tracking number.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the siteâ€™s color theme and typography.
frontend/src/lib/contactValidation.ts: Validates contact form fields for required values and formatting, returning error messages.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date-time strings.
frontend/src/lib/maintenanceMode.ts: Exports a flag controlling whether the site runs in maintenance mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the full app with React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Implements the About page with hero content, stats, mission statements, and value cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission simulation, and a success alert alongside a contact details section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero video, highlight statistics, and navigation buttons to key site sections.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays grouped service categories with icons and descriptions using a reusable section component.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Provides a shipment tracking UI with a disabled input and a 'coming soon' notice.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing scroll position on navigation.
